entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm.
